title: Mountain Climbing Day! The Long Awaited Companion Joins!!
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>*Breathe in*-.... *Breathe out*-.... The cold, fresh air that seeps deep into your lungs…. I can’t get enough of it….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It was so hot during the walk here, but the peak feels so nice and cool~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Come look, Emma. The town seems so small from here....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It really does! We’ve climbed pretty far, huh. I had so much fun walking with you that I didn’t even realize it, Umi-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Kuh…. Thank you so much, Emma! Thank you for climbing with me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eeeh!? What’s up all of a sudden? I’m also thankful that you invited me~. It’s been a long time since I felt the mountain air, I’m so happy<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Emma….! I’m so blessed to have a friend that understands the greatness of mountains. Alright, let’s find a spot with a great view and have lunch there<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yaay~! I’m looking forward to lunch! Ah, speaking of which, I found some edible berries on the way here. Let’s have them for dessert~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Huh…. So you have some survival knowledge, Emma…. This looks more and more promising…. Maybe we can increase the challenge for our next destination….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eh? Did you say something, Umi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
